## leger secrets delete

Delete a secret

### Synopsis

Delete a secret from leger.run backend.

Warning: This is permanent and cannot be undone.

Flags:
  --force   Skip confirmation prompt

```
leger secrets delete <name> [flags]
```

```
      --force   Skip confirmation prompt
  -h, --help    help for delete
```
